00078 void GenericDataHeaderTest::NameValTest()
00079 {
00080         std::wstring p[] = {L"Uma",L"Thurman",L"Angelina",L"Jolie",L"Isabella ",L"Rossellini"};
00081         ParameterNameValueType t1;
00082         t1.SetName(p[0]);
00083         t1.SetValueText(p[1]);
00084         header->AddNameValParam(t1);
00085 
00086         ParameterNameValueType t2;
00087         t2.SetName(p[2]);
00088         t2.SetValueText(p[3]);
00089         header->AddNameValParam(t2);
00090 
00091         ParameterNameValueType t3;
00092         t3.SetName(p[4]);
00093         t3.SetValueText(p[5]);
00094         header->AddNameValParam(t3);
00095         ParameterNameValueTypeIt begin;
00096         ParameterNameValueTypeIt end;
00097         header->GetNameValIterators(begin, end);
00098         if(begin != end)
00099         {
00100                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(begin->GetName() == p[0]);
00101                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(begin->GetValueText() == p[1]);
00102                 begin++;
00103         }
00104         if(begin != end)
00105         {
00106                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(begin->GetName() == p[2]);
00107                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(begin->GetValueText() == p[3]);
00108                 begin++;
00109         }
00110         if(begin != end)
00111         {
00112                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(begin->GetName() == p[4]);
00113                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(begin->GetValueText() == p[5]);
00114         }
00115 }

00117 void GenericDataHeaderTest::AddParentEntryTest()
00118 {
00119         GenericDataHeader header1;
00120         std::string s1 = "Uma Thurman";
00121         header1.SetFileId(s1);
00122         GenericDataHeader header2;
00123         std::string s2 = "Angelina Jolie";
00124         header2.SetFileId(s2);
00125         GenericDataHeader header3;
00126         std::string s3 = "Isabella Rossellini";
00127         header3.SetFileId(s3);
00128         header->AddParent(header1);
00129         header->AddParent(header2);
00130         header->AddParent(header3);
00131         GenDataHdrVectorIt begin;
00132         GenDataHdrVectorIt end;
00133         header->GetParentIterators(begin, end);
00134         if(begin != end)
00135         {
00136                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(begin->GetFileId() == s1);
00137                 begin++;
00138         }
00139         if(begin != end)
00140         {
00141                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(begin->GetFileId() == s2);
00142                 begin++;
00143         }
00144         if(begin != end)
00145         {
00146                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(begin->GetFileId() == s3);
00147         }
00148 }

00150 void GenericDataHeaderTest::GetNumParentsTest()
00151 {
00152         GenericDataHeader header1;
00153         GenericDataHeader header2;
00154         GenericDataHeader header3;
00155         header->AddParent(header1);
00156         header->AddParent(header2);
00157         header->AddParent(header3);
00158         int sz = header->GetParentCnt();
00159         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(sz == 3);
00160 }

00162 void GenericDataHeaderTest::GetNameValPairCntTest()
00163 {

00165         ParameterNameValueType t1;

00169

00171         t2.SetName(p[2]);
00172         t2.SetValueText(p[3]);
00173         header->AddNameValParam(t2);
00174

00176         t3.SetName(p[4]);

00182 void GenericDataHeaderTest::GetNameValPairTest()
00183 {
00184         std::wstring p[] = {L"Uma",L"Thurman",L"Angelina",L"Jolie",L"Isabella ",L"Rossellini"};
00185         ParameterNameValueType t1;
00186         t1.SetName(p[0]);
00187         t1.SetValueText(p[1]);
00188         header->AddNameValParam(t1);
00189 
00190         ParameterNameValueType t2;
00191         t2.SetName(p[2]);
00192         t2.SetValueText(p[3]);
00193         header->AddNameValParam(t2);
00194 
00195         ParameterNameValueType t3;
00196         t3.SetName(p[4]);
00197         t3.SetValueText(p[5]);
00198         header->AddNameValParam(t3);
00199         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(header->GetNameValParam(0).GetName() == p[0]);
00200         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(header->GetNameValParam(0).GetValueText() == p[1]);
00201         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(header->GetNameValParam(1).GetName() == p[2]);
00202         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(header->GetNameValParam(1).GetValueText() == p[3]);
00203         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(header->GetNameValParam(2).GetName() == p[4]);
00204         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(header->GetNameValParam(2).GetValueText() == p[5]);
00205 }

00207 void GenericDataHeaderTest::UpdateNameValPairTest()
00208 {
00209         std::wstring p[] = {L"Uma",L"Thurman",L"Angelina",L"Jolie",L"Isabella ",L"Rossellini"};
00210         ParameterNameValueType t1;
00211         t1.SetName(p[0]);
00212         t1.SetValueText(p[1]);
00213         header->AddNameValParam(t1);
00214 
00215         ParameterNameValueType t2;
00216         t2.SetName(p[2]);
00217         t2.SetValueText(p[3]);
00218         header->AddNameValParam(t2);
00219 
00220         ParameterNameValueType t3;
00221         t3.SetName(p[4]);
00222         t3.SetValueText(p[5]);
00223         header->AddNameValParam(t3);
00224         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(header->GetNameValParam(0).GetValueText() == p[1]);
00225 }

00227 void GenericDataHeaderTest::FindNameValPairTest()
00228 {
00229         std::wstring p[] = {L"Uma",L"Thurman",L"Angelina",L"Jolie",L"Isabella ",L"Rossellini"};
00230         ParameterNameValueType t1;
00231         t1.SetName(p[0]);
00232         t1.SetValueText(p[1]);
00233         header->AddNameValParam(t1);
00234 
00235         ParameterNameValueType t2;
00236         t2.SetName(p[2]);
00237         t2.SetValueText(p[3]);
00238         header->AddNameValParam(t2);
00239 
00240         ParameterNameValueType t3;
00241         t3.SetName(p[4]);
00242         t3.SetValueText(p[5]);
00243         header->AddNameValParam(t3);
00244 
00245         ParameterNameValueType t4;
00246         t4.SetName(L"");
00247         t4.SetValueText(L"");
00248         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(header->FindNameValParam(p[0], t4));
00249         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(t4.GetName() == p[0]);
00250         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(t4.GetValueText() == p[1]);
00251         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(header->FindNameValParam(L"Oingo Boingo", t4) == false);
00252 }
00253 
00254 void GenericDataHeaderTest::GetNameValParamsBeginsWithTest()
00255 {
00256         std::wstring names[] = {L"prefix-one", L"two", L"prefix-three"};
00257         ParameterNameValueType t;
00258 
00259         for (int32_t i = 0; i < 3; ++i)
00260         {
00261                 t.SetName(names[i]);
00262                 t.SetValueInt32(i);
00263                 header->AddNameValParam(t);
00264         }
00265         
00266         ParameterNameValueTypeVector v;
00267         header->GetNameValParamsBeginsWith(L"prefix-", v);
00268         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(v.size() == 2);
00269         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(v.at(0).GetName() == names[0]);
00270         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(v.at(1).GetName() == names[2]);
00271 }
00272 
00273 void GenericDataHeaderTest::FindParentByFileTypeIdTest()
00274 {
00275         GenericDataHeader header1;
00276         header1.SetFileTypeId("Fred");
00277         GenericDataHeader header2;
00278         header2.SetFileTypeId("Wilma");
00279         GenericDataHeader header3;
00280         header3.SetFileTypeId("Betty");
00281         header->AddParent(header1);
00282         header->AddParent(header2);
00283         header->AddParent(header3);
00284 
00285         GenericDataHeader* gdh = header->FindParent("Wilma");
00286         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(gdh != 0);
00287         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(gdh->GetFileTypeId() == "Wilma");
00288         gdh = header->FindParent("nonexistant");
00289         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(gdh == 0);
00290 }
